item.title: How do I make a new PK area?
item.dc:creator: @skittle385 skittle385
item.description:
@skittle385 wrote:

Okay well someonne told me just to copy and paste other pks and this is what i got from itâ€¦

public boolean IsInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if (coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3967 && coordX <= 3392 && coordX >= 2942) { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if (coordY >= 3512 && coordY <= 3967 && coordX <= 3392 && coordX >= 2942) { return true; } } else if (Type == 3) { if (coordY >= 9775 && coordY <= 9761 && coordX <= 3175 && coordX >= 3161) { return true; } } return false; }

and i want the third one to work but it wont

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make a new PK area?
